availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Anthony Crockett (Franklin County, Kentucky, farmer and justice of the peace.)

body.p: Franklin County, Kentucky, farmer and justice of the peace. Married to Susan Robb Crockett in Franklin County, Kentucky, on August 22, 1833. Father of Ann M. Crockett, Mary A. Crockett, Samuel F. Crockett, William G. Crockett, Margaret J. Crockett, George Crockett, and James Crockett. Farmer in Franklin County, Kentucky, in 1850. Owned seven enslaved persons in Franklin County in 1850. Farmer in Franklin County in 1860. Owned eight enslaved persons in Franklin County in 1860. Justice of the peace in Franklin County in 1860.
